Cristiano Ronaldos return to Old Trafford hasnt just been popular amongst the Red Devils fans, but it has earned him a fair chunk of money too.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Wills family descendant claims he sent AFL information on Tom Wills Aboriginal massacre allegations years ago - ABC News
articles.description: A Wills family descendant claims he sent information to the AFL several years ago suggesting Aussie Rules pioneer Tom Wills had been involved in atrocities against Aboriginal people.
articles.content: The AFL was sent historical research suggesting that football pioneer Tom Wills had participated in the mass murder of Gayiri Aboriginal people but did not respond to the information, according to a … [+10893 chars]
